rooms.description: A welcoming area with a reception desk and coat check, aligned to the north-east corner for positive energy according to Vastu.

The duplex studio is open-concept with living space, kitchenette, and a combined dining area. It follows industrial design aesthetics with exposed brickwork and metal accents. Vastu principles recommend placing the main entrance towards the north-east for auspicious entry.

A quiet study/library space located adjacent to the studio apartment, designed with ample shelving and comfortable seating. Placed in the south-west corner as per Vastu for knowledge and concentration.
A large garden surrounding the house that provides green space, relaxation, and a natural ventilation corridor. It is central to the plot layout ensuring energy balance as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large windows in the north and east directions to maximize natural light and positive energy flow.
Provides an outdoor view and enhances air circulation.
